name: Literate
description:
Nathan is a young boy who simply can't figure out the puzzle that is words and letters. To him, those words and letters are part of a world he can never understand.

So, he creates his own world, the world of Literate, where rabbits are made of letters-- letters he can understand--and talk to him about the troubles with his reading and with his father.

Follow Nathan on a journey to discover how he can become literate, while engrossing himself in his precious world of Literate.

Please note: game will take time to load for certain scenes. In addition, music takes a while to start up in the browser. If you would like to hear the music right away, which I highly recommend, please download the file "Literate With Music", extract it, and enjoy!
